Question: Shenzhen Yidashun Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yidashun Technology Co., Ltd.

GaN PD Charger

- Professional manufacturer and exporter
- Products include GaN PD Charger, USB-C PD Power Adapter, Mobile Charger, travel charger, car charger, power adapter, power supply, LED driver, and cables
- Wide range of applications for phone, tablet, iPhone, iPad, MacBook, laptops, power bank, LED lights, CCTV cameras, and other smart electric equipment
- ISO 9001 quality management system certificate and various product certificates including CE, UKCA, FCC, ROHS, REACH, ERP, CB, CETL, UL, C-TICK, SAA, KC, KCC, PSE, BIS, BSMI, and VDE
- OEM/ODM orders welcomed
- Two factories in Shenzhen specializing in manufacturing laptop adapters/chargers, USB C adapter, AC/DC adapters, universal laptop adapters, switching power supply, waterproof LED driver, and power cables
- Products pass CE, ROHS, FCC, ERP, CB, UL, GS certificates and exported worldwide
Summary_cn:
深圳亿达顺科技有限公司。

GaN PD 充电器

- 专业制造商和出口商
- 产品包括 GaN PD 充电器，USB-C PD 电源适配器，移动充电器，旅行充电器，汽车充电器，电源适配器，电源供应器，LED 驱动器和电缆
- 广泛适用于手机，平板电脑，iPhone，iPad，MacBook，笔记本电脑，移动电源，LED 灯，闭路电视摄像机和其他智能电器设备
- ISO 9001 质量管理体系证书以及包括 CE、UKCA、FCC、ROHS、REACH、ERP、CB、CETL、UL、C-TICK、SAA、KC、KCC、PSE、BIS、BSMI 和 VDE 在内的各种产品证书
- 欢迎 OEM/ODM 订单
- 深圳拥有两家专业制造笔记本电脑适配器/充电器，USB C 适配器，AC/DC 适配器，通用笔记本电脑适配器，开关电源供应器，防水 LED 驱动器和电源电缆的工厂
- 产品通过 CE、ROHS、FCC、ERP、CB、UL、GS 认证并出口到全球各地
